title: Your weather update for Tuesday (3)
body_lines: Showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and Galle and Matara districts.
Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Central and Uva province, and Ampara district during the evening or night.
The general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
China supports Sri Lanka’s decision to work with IMF in restructuring debt – Ambassador
India assures continued support to Sri Lanka; High Commissioner meets Finance Minister
